name: browsers-profiles
description: Access your browsers profiles from Raycast
author: skydiver

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

commands.name: index
commands.title: Open Browser Profile
commands.description: Access your browsers profiles from Raycast

preferences.description: Filter the browsers to show (comma separated list - this will be compared to the browser title or family)
preferences.name: browsers.filter
preferences.title: Browsers Filter

title: Open Browsers Profiles
